body:
Hey everyone, I'm not trying to sound angry or diss anyone or anything, so try not to take any offence, but I'm just simply wondering when the staff will fix this 'timed out' problem, because this problem just won't leave for me and is starting to eat away at my patience..

I know you can say just be patient, its just my two concerns is that the server has recently been gaining people, and it has been more alive, but if 50% of our players are going to time out every 30 seconds to 2 minutes, then i don't image they will be here long..

But also, I'm starting to run low of time to play, as i am busy with end of school stuff and i will be gone from the server for a while in the holidays, so id love to play some more while i actually have time. And i don't want to sound selfish, but I'm sure there are others who can relate with the time to play thing..

Anyways, I'm simply wondering - from a mod or player - when you think this will stop?

Thanks all - OPTOBAT
body_tagged:
